post_message: Today, under the leadership of Congresswoman Rosa DeLauro, House Democrats are again taking the lead in addressing one of the most pressing economic challenges confronting our country by re-introducing the Paycheck Fairness Act. Securing a fair shot for women in the workplace is critical to ensuring prosperity for our nation.
